title: 2017 Toyota Mirai (not running, For Parts or Repair)
item_description:
2017 Toyota Mirai (not running, For Parts or Repair)

This vehicle is non-functional. Hydrogen tanks have been removed. Other parts may be missing as well. Sold as-is.

Specifications

  • Year: 2017
  • Make: Toyota
  • Model: Mirai
  • VIN: JTDBVRBD7HA001490
  • License per DMV (not included): 8TBV535  
    • Registration Expiration: 3/12/2023
    • Salvaged
  • Current Odometer Reads: NA. TMU (total mileage unknown)
    • Odometer per Bill of Sale 9/28/2023: 61,295
    • Odometer per DMV 7/25/2022: 60,622
  • Key: Available
  • GVWR: 4810
  • Body Style: Sedan
  • Tire Size: 215/55r17

Exterior

  • Exterior Color: White
  • Doors: Four Door

Interior

  • Interior Material: Vinyl
  • Interior Color: Black

Note: This vehicle was sold via Lien Sale on 5/17/2023. The vehicle was then sold 6/15/2023, and sold again 9/28/2023. The Current seller has the lien sale paperwork and bills of sale from previous transfers. The Buyer will get lien sale paperwork from first transfer and all other paperwork will be mailed 1-2 weeks following the last day of removal. The Bidder shall not bid on behalf of another individual; the Bidder/Purchaser/DMV Registrant must be the same. The Buyer is fully responsible for all aspects of the transfer, inspections,  registration, sales tax, and fees due to DMV.
